trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Drawing.Printing" /> namespace provides print-related services for Windows Forms applications.
trans-unit.target: Lo spazio dei nomi <see cref="N:System.Drawing.Printing" /> fornisce servizi correlati alla stampa per applicazioni Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Typically, when you print from a Windows Forms application, you create a new instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> class, set properties, such as <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A>, that describe how to print, and call the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> method to actually print the document.
trans-unit.target: In genere, quando si stampa da un'applicazione Windows Forms, si crea una nuova istanza del <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> , impostare le proprietà, ad esempio <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A>, che descrivono cosa stampare e chiamare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> metodo per stampare il documento.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, which should be handled to perform the document layout for printing.
trans-unit.target: La chiamata di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> metodo genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento, che deve essere gestito per eseguire il layout del documento per la stampa.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> object obtained from the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> event to specify the output to print.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> ottenuto dall'oggetto di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento per specificare l'output da stampare.

trans-unit.source: If you are printing a text file, use <xref:System.IO.StreamReader> to read one line at a time from the stream and call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> method to draw the line in the graphics object.
trans-unit.target: Se si stampa un file di testo, utilizzare <xref:System.IO.StreamReader> per leggere una riga alla volta dal flusso e chiamare il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> metodo consente di disegnare la riga nell'oggetto grafico.

trans-unit.source: For more information about this process, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> and <xref:System.IO.StreamReader> classes.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su questo processo, vedere il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> e <xref:System.IO.StreamReader> classi.

trans-unit.source: You can view an example of printing a text document in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: È possibile visualizzare un esempio di stampare un documento di testo nel <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> Cenni preliminari sulla classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class are not supported for printing.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> metodi di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> classe non sono supportati per la stampa.

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare invece il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> metodi la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> classe.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> controls how a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> is printed.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> controlli come un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> viene stampato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method invokes the print controller's <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> methods, which in turn tell the printer how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> metodo richiama il controller di stampa <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> metodi, che a sua volta informazioni della stampante stampare il documento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing dialog boxes, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulle finestre di dialogo Stampa, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog>.

trans-unit.source: The print-preview process uses a specialized print controller, dialog box, and control.
trans-unit.target: Il processo di anteprima di stampa utilizza un controller di stampa specializzate, la finestra di dialogo e controllo.

trans-unit.source: For an example of such a print controller and dialog box, see <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>.
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio di questo controller di stampa e la finestra di dialogo, vedere <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>.

trans-unit.source: Classes within the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service.
trans-unit.target: Le classi all'interno di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> dello spazio dei nomi non sono supportati per l'utilizzo all'interno di un servizio Windows o l'applicazione ASP.NET o servizio.

trans-unit.source: Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Il tentativo di utilizzare queste classi da all'interno di uno di questi tipi di applicazioni può generare problemi imprevisti, ad esempio diminuita eccezioni prestazioni e in fase di esecuzione del servizio.

trans-unit.source: If you want to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera stampare da un'applicazione Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF), vedere il <xref:System.Printing> dello spazio dei nomi.
